availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union fort constructed on Lake Ontario at the mouth of the Oswego River between 1839 and 1844.

ab.bibl:
"Oswego, New York," USGS: Earth Explorer, accessed January 3, 2023, https://earthexplorer.usgs.gov/.
"Fort Ontario" National Register of Historic Places Inventory - Nomination Form, Entry Number 70.12.36.0013.
John R. Weaver II, A Legacy in Brick and Stone: American Coastal Defense Forts of the Third System, 1816-1867, (McLean, Virginia: Redoubt Press, 2018), 59, 78.
